DOC.brief_summary: Our primary objective is to evaluate the relevance of the early determination of Candida infection status among non-neutropenic patients hospitalized over 48 hours in ICUs.
DOC.criteria: Polynuclear neutrophils > 500/mm^3 Hospitalized for > 48 hours in participating ICUs Patients discharged from ICU in < 48h Patient diagnosed with invasive candidosis before entry to ICU Patient is taking an antifungal treatment polynuclear neutrophils < 500/mm^3 patient transferred to another ICU patient included in the Abmidex protocole
